comments.comment:
Great catch. Note that there is another issue with the current condition. It is not clear that the "0.0" indicates that the threshold is not used. Better would be: <denchmark-code>if "chi_squared" in description and description["chi_squared"][1] < chi_squared_threshold: </denchmark-code>
A PR is welcome (with some unit tests). Side note: We're planning to add more statistical hypothesis tests.
Taken into account in the next release.
